Recommended Treatment: Adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy following total hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy; observation alone is an acceptable alternative for stage IB, grade 2 endometrioid carcinoma (Category 2A).
Description: The specimen shows a grade 2 endometrioid endometrial adenocarcinoma with minimal superficial myometrial invasion (1.0 mm), no lymphovascular invasion, and negative lymph nodes, corresponding to FIGO Stage IB.
Patient Notes: Your pathology shows a moderately differentiated uterine cancer that has only superficially invaded the muscle layer and has not spread to lymph nodes. You have already had surgery to remove the uterus and ovaries. Based on current guidelines, we recommend a form of targeted internal radiation (vaginal brachytherapy) to reduce the risk of recurrence, although careful observation without further treatment is also an option for your stage of disease.
